entry.title: Re Pearl points are updated every week based on how much you stake and will be redeemable against $SWELL at TGE. They also set some collective milesto...
entry.summary: Re Pearl points are updated every week based on how much you stake and will be redeemable against $SWELL at TGE. They also set some collective milestone targets that when hit, will give everyone more $SWELL. The target is 50k $ETH and it seems like they're halfway there. https://t.co/iYhgoSAOJE
